def_en: If you refer to something or someone as a relic of an earlier period, you mean that they belonged to that period but have survived into the present.

def_cn: (有历史价值的)遗物，遗迹，遗址
def_en: A relic is something which was made or used a long time ago and which is kept for its historical significance.
A relic is the body of a saint or something else associated with a saint, which some people regard as holy.
